title: 用到scoreboard就报错，一脸懵逼
author: guaiMiao~
txt_content:
只要用到scoreboard就报错，我也是醉了，谁知道这是为什么啊
org.bukkit.event.EventException: null
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:301) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]

        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:484) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.PlayerList.attemptLogin(PlayerList.java:514) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.LoginListener.b(LoginListener.java:101) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.LoginListener.tick(LoginListener.java:53) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:909) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.DedicatedServer.b(DedicatedServer.java:382) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:791) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:694) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_201]
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot set scoreboard yet
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_13_R2.entity.CraftPlayer.setScoreboard(CraftPlayer.java:1422) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-a5b9c7b]
        at control.MyScoreBoard.onLogin(MyScoreBoard.java:20) ~[?:?]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_201]

replies.author: 海螺螺
replies.txt_content:
PlayerLoginEvent这个事件的时候，玩家还没进服务器
用 PlayerJoinEvent 或者延后几tick

replies.author: guaiMiao~
replies.txt_content:
754503921 发表于 2019-7-2 14:16
PlayerLoginEvent这个事件的时候，玩家还没进服务器
用 PlayerJoinEvent 或者延后几tick ...
感谢大佬，终于不报错了
